SageTVPlugin.Name: DVB Decrypter Smartcard Server (OsCAM)
SageTVPlugin.Description: This is the DVB Decrypter smartcard server (OsCAM) - no need to install separately.
SageTVPlugin.Author: routerunner
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes: 1.0.0 - First Public Release. 1.0.1 - Update to build #8935. 1.0.2 - Update to build #9665. Removed OsCAM Launcher from distribution. 1.0.3 - RossiSoft build (#10518) with PCSC and Smartreader support, custom plugin interface. 1.0.4 - Same version as 1.0.3 which had a malformed package. 1.0.5 - Added new SKY NewZealand ATR entries for videoguard. 1.0.6 - Update to build #11488. 1.0.7 - Update to build #11505. 1.0.8 - Fixed wrong installation path.
